chara.textHome:
My name is Sasara Minagi.
My father is part of a rescue team
and the person I respect most.

Having the courage to face the odds,
no matter how bad, to save another's life...

It makes him just as cool as
the knights in picture books.
As his daughter, I want to be strong too.

Only a handful of people ever accomplish
the lofty dreams they have as children, yes?

That's why achieving my childhood dream
of becoming a knight makes me
one of the luckiest people alive.

Someone will always be in need of rescue.
So I will always continue to come to their aid.
Fulfilling my duty as a Magical Girl...
I'm sure my father would be proud.

They say "like father, like daughter."
Well, the daughter of a rescue team
member is a rescuer!
Hehe, well I think so.

I've committed myself wholly to rescuing
others...like my father before me!

My father saves people from disasters...
I save people from Witches.

Getting to follow in his footsteps
makes me so happy.

But of course...I've kept being
a Magical Girl secret from him.

I was waiting for you so
we could train together!
Okay, let's start with a warmup!

Morning! I slept really well last night,
so I feel great now!
I don't need time to wake up in the morning.
Knights are always on duty!
Oh no, look at the time!
It's already lunchtime! I've gotta eat!

I need to keep my strength up, so I always
make sure to eat three meals a day.

I'm going on patrol after
club activities are over...

It's not easy, but if the town is
safe because of my work,
it's totally worth it!
Oh no, look at the time!
I need to sleep! I've gotta get to bed!

I can't save anyone if I'm spacing
out from lack of sleep!

I really admire the work my dad does...
He saves a ton of people.
He's both strong and kind.
He's the person I look up to the most.
Right, time for us to go!

Even if no one calls for us, we can't
slack off when it comes to our patrol.
We're the knights of Kamihama, after all!

You can't only focus on sword fighting.
You have to train your heart as well.
That's why I never let myself feel scared!
No matter who the enemy is,
I'll face them head on!

I always thought badminton was a more
laid-back sport until I watched a practice.
Professional matches are really something.
They're so fast! Have you ever seen one?

I'm in the badminton club at school.
I would've joined the fencing club
if they'd had one, though.

It would've been perfect
training for a knight.
My dad is so cool! Huh?
You're sick of hearing that?
No, wait!
I'm talking about how he looks!
He's tall, he's built, and...
Am I really that impatient?
Everyone always tells me that I am...
But, you know what?

You need to move fast
when you're saving lives!

I always have the picture book about
the Knight from when I was a kid with me.

Whenever I worry about something I read it,
and somehow it makes me feel braver.

A true knight would never feel good
only protecting Kamihama.

My dream is to one day be able to
protect people all over the world!
"Have...you...finished..."
Ugh.
Are you any good at English?
Can you help me?
English is my worst subject...

Asuka can't multitask.
Like she can't watch TV while on the phone.

Even outside of battle, she really
puts her all into everything she does.

I wished to have the power to save people,
like a knight, when I became a Magical Girl.

When you think about it, I was basically
wishing to become a Magical Girl.
A knight faces their foe head-on!
I shall do the same!
I'm gonna get even stronger!
I'm happy that I can protect everyone...!
I wish Dad could see me doing this.
This is the duty of a knight!
Are you the one who called for help?

I'm Sasara Minagi.
Everything is all right now that I'm here.

From now on, call on me whenever
you're in trouble, okay?
Yes! Even my swordsmanship has improved!

A strong knight who makes
others feel safe...
Now, I just might be one.
Becoming a knight isn't the end.
It's where the real story begins.

Nothing makes me happier than
becoming stronger.

I don't want to regret not being strong
enough to save someone ever again,
so I'll redouble my efforts.

Becoming a Magical Girl made
me realize many things.
The knights in picture books, for example...

They're not just incredibly strong,
but I think they're also
extremely kind people.
